titles.title: A bill to temporarily extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Miller, George moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 3180.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 6/30/2008--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Amends the Higher Education Extension Act of 2005 to extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965 through July 31, 2008.
